about_the_game:
Enter Rots….a foul-mouthed, short-tempered, and belligerent undead female warrior "erected" to serve the Ignoble King completing his mundane tasks and honoring his frustrating requests. Venture into a world that takes jabs at the RPG genre, does not take itself seriously, and has a give no ****s attitude!

ERADICATE THE MEATBAGS

Battle it out in frustration with 100+ enemies and monsters determined to stop Rots for their own selfish gain and glory. Find and eradicate the numerous meatbags that plague the land, and just because Rots can't stand them.

VENTURE FORTH

Explore un-typical numerous locations, towers, dungeons and caves and watch as Rots' temper flares! Visit the Caves of Frustration, and stay awhile. Or shack it up in Rots' Lair for some quality reading and a bathroom break.

THE GRIND BUT SHORT!

40+ hours of RPG style game play that deviates from the cliche's of the genre and does not take itself seriously. Grind your way to restore Rots' lost power and seek revenge against the Ignoble King.

INFUSION

Infuse Rot's weapons, armor, and accessories from random items and parts taken from defeated enemies, or found in the world. Enhance your gear with extra stats of your choosing based on the item used. Careful when infusing, there are no take-backs!

ELEMENTS OH MY!

Exploit the elemental weaknesses of Rots' enemies. Be wary as Rots' foes are also able to exploit her weaknesses as well. Find items or abilities that can bolster Rots' elemental defenses, or weaken her foes.

THANK YOU AUTO-SAVE

Save early and save often! You never know when the enemy will take advantage of Rots' anger and frustration! Auto-Save is your friend and back-up plan for when you have forgotten to save before a big moment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: Official To Kill A King Trailer

name: To Kill A King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews:
“Really good old-school take on an RPG with humor that gives no f*cks.”
5.0 – Google Play

“Just started playing this game so far and I'm already in love with it. The game has a great storyline, great dirty humor, and is just amazing. The game also has great character development. There's upgrades and skills and items and you can infuse your items dropped by funny enemies into your weapons and gear and a big map to go and explore, the npcs are hilarious. Amazing game keep up the good work! 100% recommend.”
5.0 – Google Play

“Humorously irrevrent take on the classic jrpg. Nicely crafted and pleased to see no IAP/premissions.”
4.0 – Google Play
